Reason: The configuration option 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' is classified as performance-sensitive. This is because the value of 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' directly impacts the off-heap memory limit for memtables in the createMemtableAllocatorPool method. The off-heap memory allocation has a significant impact on system performance, as it affects memory consumption and allocation efficiency. Therefore, any changes to 'memtable_offheap_space_in_mb' can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
